select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from oclass WHERE userId = #{userId}

s.scdUploadDate as scdUploadDate FROM schedule s, oclass o where s.clsId = o.clsId and userId = #{userId} order by s.scdUploadDate desc limit #{endRow} offset #{startRow}
